data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 3, Free kick Recife PE.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Goias's Fernandao scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 5, Shaylon with an assist there.
Goias's Breno breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 7, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Recife PE throw-in in Goias's half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 12, Fernandao for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Fernandao, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Fernandao is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 14, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 19, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Throw-in Goias.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 22, In Goiania Goias attack through Jefferson. The finish is off target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 24, Recife PE are coming forward and Patric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Goias.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Goias's Rafael Moura has run offside.
In the minute 30, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Goiania, Rafael Moura of Goias is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Goias throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 33, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias's Fernandao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 35, Goias have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 37, Recife PE push forward at Serra Dourada and Thiago Neves gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goias defence.
Shaylon for Goias drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE just outside Goias's area.
In Goiania, Iago Maidana (Recife PE) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 42, Recife PE's Lucas Mugni gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
Thiago Neves (Recife PE) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Recife PE.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Recife PEâ€™s Adryelson is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
The first-half has ended.
At Serra Dourada, Rafael Moura has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, Adryelson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Recife PE make their first substitution with Betinho replacing Ronaldo.
In the minute 47, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias's Shaylon misses with an attempt on goal.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
In Goiania Goias drive forward through Douglas Baggio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 52, Lucas Mugni for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 53, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Recife PE throw-in in Goias's half.
Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Recife PE drive forward but Dalberto is judged offside.
In the minute 56, Goias have a goal kick.
Dalberto of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 58, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernandao is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Recife PE's Dalberto is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 60, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 61, Free kick Goias.
Dalberto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 63, In Goiania, Adryelson (Recife PE) misses the target with a header.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Goias a goal kick.
Vinicius Lopes is replacing Fernandao for the home team.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goias have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
Important block from the Goias defence as Thiago Neves fires in a strike for Recife PE.
In the minute 73, Can Recife PE capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Recife PE push upfield and Iago Maidana gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Goias defence.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Goias.
Gustavo Blanco is on a sub for Douglas Baggio for Goias.
In the minute 77, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 79, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Goias's Gustavo Blanco has been booked in Goiania.
In the minute 81, Raul Prata is replacing Marquinhos for Recife PE at Serra Dourada.
The away team replace Lucas Mugni with Mikael.
In the minute 82, Free kick Goias.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Raul Prata (Recife PE) has received a yellow card from Braulio da Silva Machado.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 86, Tadeu (Goias) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Augusto Cesar (Goias) is making a third substitution, with Miguel Figueira replacing Ariel Cabral.
In the minute 87, The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tadeu, who is down injured.
Jair Ventura is making the team's fourth substitution at Serra Dourada with Sander replacing Junior Tavares.
In the minute 88, Tadeu is back on the pitch.
The away team have replaced Marcao Silva with Bruninho. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jair Ventura.
Goias will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
Breno for Goias has been booked by Braulio da Silva Machado and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sander for Recife PE is whistled offside.
Throw-in Recife PE.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
In Goiania Recife PE attack through Betinho. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
